pullRequest.title: Return identifier from CreateResourceService
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA Ticket: https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3175
What does this Pull Request do?
We need to return the identifier from the kernel/service level to the HTTP level to send out a response. This PR starts returning the identifier from the service layer.
How should this be tested?
This will still throw errors on a POST, but its incremental and tests have been updated.
Interested parties
@fcrepo4/committers

nodes.bodyText: think some accidental parameter squishing happened here, should be a space after true,
looks like your IDE went to town around here, but i think its fine.

commit.message: Try again to clean up code formatting
